title: Why Should Python Developers Care About Testing
author: Victor Iwuoha
description: As with any standard programming language, testing in Python software development simply involves validating that your app does what it is supposed to do.
cntitle: 为什么 Python 开发人员应该关心测试
cndescription: 与任何标准编程语言一样，Python 软件开发中的测试只是验证您的应用程序是否按预期执行。
